00020 #include <rdkcore/geometry/utils.h>
00021 #include "laserdata.h"
00022 
00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00024     using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00025     using namespace std;
00026     
00027     DMatrixD LaserData::getFisherForXY() {
00028         DMatrixD fisher(2,2);
00029         
00030         fisher.setAll(0);
00031         for(size_t i=0;i< points.size();i++) {
00032             if( (!points[i].isValid()) || (!points[i].hasTrueAlpha()))  {
00033     //          cout << "ray i= " << i << " is invalid" << endl;
00034                 continue;
00035             }
00036             double alpha_i = points[i].trueAlpha;
00037             double beta_i = alpha_i - (estimatedPose.theta+points[i].theta);
00038         //  cout << "ray i=" <<i << " valid = " << points[i].isValid() 
00039         //      << " reading = " << points[i].reading << 
00040         //       " alpha = " << alpha_i << " beta_i = " << beta_i  << endl; 
00041             
00042             fisher.el(0,0) += cos(alpha_i)*cos(alpha_i) / square(cos(beta_i));
00043             fisher.el(1,1) += sin(alpha_i)*sin(alpha_i) / square(cos(beta_i));
00044             fisher.el(0,1) += sin(alpha_i)*cos(alpha_i) / square(cos(beta_i));
00045             fisher.el(1,0) += sin(alpha_i)*cos(alpha_i) / square(cos(beta_i));
00046         }
00047         
00048         //cout << "fisher : " <<fisher<<endl;
00049         return fisher;
00050     }
00051     
00052     double LaserData::getFisherForTheta() {
00053         double fim = 0;
00054         for(int i=0;i<(int)points.size();i++) {
00055             if(!points[i].hasTrueAlpha()) continue;
00056             double r_i =  points[i].reading;
00057             double alpha_i = points[i].trueAlpha;
00058             double beta_i = alpha_i - (estimatedPose.theta+points[i].theta);
00059 
00060             fim += square(r_i) * square(tan(beta_i));  
00061         }
00062         return fim;
00063     }
00064     
00065     DMatrixD LaserData::getFisher() {
00066         // top right matrix of Fisher's information matrix
00067         DMatrixD tr(2,1);   
00068         
00069         tr.setAll(0);
00070         for(int i=0;i<(int)points.size();i++) {
00071             if(!points[i].hasTrueAlpha()) continue;
00072             
00073             double alpha_i = points[i].trueAlpha;
00074             double beta_i = alpha_i - (estimatedPose.theta+points[i].theta);
00075             
00076             tr.el(0,0) += cos(alpha_i) * tan(beta_i) / cos(beta_i);
00077             tr.el(1,0) += sin(alpha_i) * tan(beta_i) / cos(beta_i);
00078         }
00079         
00080         DMatrixD fim_xy = getFisherForXY();
00081         double fim_theta = getFisherForTheta();
00082         
00083         DMatrixD fim(3,3);
00084         
00085         fim.el(0,0) = fim_xy.el(0,0);
00086         fim.el(1,0) = fim_xy.el(1,0);
00087         fim.el(0,1) = fim_xy.el(0,1);
00088         fim.el(1,1) = fim_xy.el(1,1);
00089 
00090         fim.el(0,2) = fim.el(2,0) = tr.el(0,0);
00091         fim.el(1,2) = fim.el(2,1) = tr.el(1,0);
00092     
00093         fim.el(2,2) = fim_theta;
00094         
00095         return fim;
00096     }
00097 }}
